listCustomEquipment.name: Armorshell Escargot (Greater)
listCustomEquipment.traits: 3rd Party, Uncommon, Alchemical, Consumable, Elixir, Mutagen, Polymorph
listCustomEquipment.description:
These snails renowned for their beautiful shells gain alchemical effects when cooked. After consumption, your skin becomes rubbery and you grow a carapace like a snail's shell on your back. This shell strengthens your defenses but leaves you unable to move quickly.

Benefit You gain the listed bonus to AC, a Dexterity cap of +2 (as usual, use your lowest Dexterity cap if you have more than one), and an item bonus to Fortitude saves. If you're wearing armor, you still calculate your proficiency bonus to AC based on your proficiency in the armor you're wearing, even if the Armorshell Escargot has a higher item bonus. While prone, you have crawl speed 15 and climb speed 10. You also gain the Shell Defense action.

Drawback You gain weakness 5 to bludgeoning damage, a -5 penalty to your movement speed (minimum 5) when not prone, and a -2 penalty to Reflex saves and athletics checks.

Shell Defense [1 action] You withdraw your limbs and head into your shell, dropping prone in the process. You can't act except to reemerge, which you can do as a single action. While within your shell, you have resistance to piercing and slashing damage as determined by Armorshell Escargot.

The item bonus to AC is +5, the item bonus to Fortitude saves is +2, and the duration is 1 hour. Shell Defense grants resistance 15 to piercing and slashing damage.
listCustomEquipment.src: Graung's Guide to Golarion: Mutagenic Gastronomy

listCustomEquipment.name: Breacher's Biscuits  (Lesser)
listCustomEquipment.traits: 3rd Party, Alchemical, Consumable, Elixir, Mutagen, Polymorph
listCustomEquipment.description:
These small, dense biscuits are said to have been created by scouts of the Crimson Reclaimers enable their agents to stealthily infiltrate the Whispering Way. Upon eating a Breacher Biscuit, your skin becomes ashen, your eyes glassy, and your body temperature falls considerably, causing you to resemble a freshly risen undead.

Benefit You gain an item bonus to Fortitude saves against diseases and poisons, an item bonus to deception checks to Lie to undead creatures, and a status bonus equal to the item bonus to Impersonate an undead version of yourself. Senses such as lifesense detect you as undead unless a creature succeeds at a Perception check against the listed DC, and on a failed check, they don't detect you at all if they only sense living creatures. You gain Resistance 5 to void damage.

Drawback You take a -1 penalty to Reflex saves, and gain Weakness 1 to bludgeoning and slashing damage. Detection spells that specifically sense living creatures detect you as normal.

The item bonus is +2, the DC is 20, and the duration is 10 minutes.

listCustomEquipment.traits: 3rd Party, Alchemical, Consumable, Elixir, Mutagen, Polymorph

listCustomEquipment.name: Candied Spiderfloss (Greater)
listCustomEquipment.traits: 3rd Party, Alchemical, Consumable, Elixir, Mutagen, Polymorph
listCustomEquipment.description:
Candied Spiderfloss is a treat prepared during many autumn festivities. After consumptions, fine hairs sprout from your body giving you the ability to sense minute changes in air currents and your limbs narrow and gain additional joins. Additionally, your mouth changes into spider-like mandibles.

Benefit You gain an item bonus to Reflex saves and Intimidation checks against humanoids, and a fangs unarmed attack. Your fangs are in the brawling group and have the finesse and unarmed traits. You can speak with spiders, with the same effects and limitations as speak with animals.

Drawback You take a –1 penalty to Diplomacy checks against humanoids and a –2 penalty to Fortitude saves. You gain Weakness 2 to bludgeoning damage.

The item bonus is +3, the jaws attack unarmed attack deals 1d10 piercing + 1d6 poison damage, and the duration is 1 hour.

listCustomEquipment.name: Candied Spiderfloss (Lesser)
listCustomEquipment.traits: 3rd Party, Alchemical, Consumable, Elixir, Mutagen, Polymorph
listCustomEquipment.description:

Drawback You take a –1 penalty to Diplomacy checks against humanoids and a –2 penalty to Fortitude saves. You gain Weakness 2 to bludgeoning damage.

The item bonus is +1, the jaws attack unarmed attack deals 1d6 piercing damage, and the duration is 1 minute.

The item bonus is +3, the jaws attack unarmed attack deals 1d10 piercing + 1d8 poison damage, and the duration is 1 hour. You gain weapon specialization for the jaws unarmed strike, or greater weapon specialization if you already have weapon specialization with this unarmed attack.

listCustomEquipment.name: Candied Spiderfloss (Moderate)
listCustomEquipment.traits: 3rd Party, Alchemical, Consumable, Elixir, Mutagen, Polymorph
listCustomEquipment.description:

Drawback You take a –1 penalty to Diplomacy checks against humanoids and a –2 penalty to Fortitude saves. You gain Weakness 2 to bludgeoning damage.

The item bonus is +2, the jaws attack unarmed attack deals 1d8 piercing damage, and the duration is 10 minutes.

listCustomEquipment.name: Diver's Calamari (Greater)
listCustomEquipment.traits: 3rd Party, Alchemical, Consumable, Elixir, Mutagen, Polymorph
listCustomEquipment.description:
Canny deep sea divers developed this hearty meal so that they could more freely search for lost treasures and in sunken ships. After consumption, this calamari skewer causes your body to narrow and elongate and your limbs to become like a squid's tentacles, giving you greater freedom of movement and dexterity in the water at the cost of your ability to function on land.

Benefit You gain a swim speed and can breathe underwater. You gain an item bonus to athletics checks made while in a body of water, and a tentacle unarmed attack which deals bludgeoning damage and has the agile, finesse, and grapple traits. You gain the Ink Escape reaction.

Drawback You take a -2 penalty to Will saves. Additionally, your form is not suited to being on land. While not submerged in water, you are Prone and unable to Stand, and you take a -2 penalty to Reflex and Fortitude saves.

Ink Escape [Reaction] Trigger an adjacent creature makes a melee strike against you; Effect You release a jet of ink and flee the triggering creature. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your AC for the strike, then swim up to 10 feet after the strike resolves.

The item bonus is +3, your swim speed is 30, the tentacle unarmed attack deals 1d8 bludgeoning damage, and the duration is 1 hour.

listCustomEquipment.name: Diver's Calamari (Major)
listCustomEquipment.traits: 3rd Party, Alchemical, Consumable, Elixir, Mutagen, Polymorph
listCustomEquipment.description:

Drawback You take a -2 penalty to Will saves. Additionally, your form is not suited to being on land. While not submerged in water, you are Prone and unable to Stand, and you take a -2 penalty to Reflex and Fortitude saves.

Ink Escape [Reaction] Trigger an adjacent creature makes a melee strike against you; Effect You release a jet of ink and flee the triggering creature. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your AC for the strike, then swim up to 10 feet after the strike resolves.

The item bonus is +4, your swim speed is 40, the tentacle unarmed attack deals 1d10 bludgeoning damage, and the duration is 1 hour.

The item bonus is +2, your swim speed is 20, the tentacle unarmed attack deals 1d6 bludgeoning damage, and the duration is 10 minutes.

listCustomEquipment.name: Gumi's Fruit Flavored Frogs (Blue Huckleberry)
listCustomEquipment.traits: 3rd Party, Rare, Alchemical, Consumable, Elixir, Mutagen, Polymorph
listCustomEquipment.description:
These fruit flavored gummy frog candies were developed by renowned tripkee alchemic chef Gumi Gaeru. Each frog provides a number of effects based on its color and flavor. When you consume one of these mutagenic candies, your eyes enlarge and protrude like a frog's, and your body is transformed as described.

Benefit Your skin becomes a translucent blue and exudes a toxic poison. Your unarmed melee strikes deal an additional 1d6 poison damage. In addition, a creature that succeeds in an unarmed melee strike against you takes 2 persistent poison damage with a DC 19 basic Fortitude save.

Drawback You become Fascinated with any insectoid or arachnid creature that you can see (as determined by the GM). This Fascination only ends if the creature takes a hostile action against you (hostile actions against your allies do not end the Fascination effect) or one round has passed with you unable to see it. You have a -2 penalty to Will saves (-4 if you are Fascinated) and a -1 penalty to Fortitude saves.

The duration is 10 minutes.

listCustomEquipment.name: Gumi's Fruit Flavored Frogs (Green Grape)
listCustomEquipment.traits: 3rd Party, Rare, Alchemical, Consumable, Elixir, Mutagen, Polymorph
listCustomEquipment.description:
These fruit flavored gummy frog candies were developed by renowned tripkee alchemic chef Gumi Gaeru. Each frog provides a number of effects based on its color and flavor. When you consume one of these mutagenic candies, your eyes enlarge and protrude like a frog's, and your body is transformed as described.

Benefit Your skin turns bright green, your tongue becomes especially long, and you can launch it with extraordinary range and precision. You can use your tongue to deliver touch-range spells and to perform Trip and Disarm checks at a distance that is 5 feet beyond your normal range.

Drawback You become Fascinated with any insectoid or arachnid creature that you can see (as determined by the GM). This Fascination only ends if the creature takes a hostile action against you (hostile actions against your allies do not end the Fascination effect) or one round has passed with you unable to see it. You have a -2 penalty to Will saves (-4 if you are Fascinated) and a -1 penalty to Fortitude saves. In addition, you gain Weakness 8 to slashing damage.

The duration is 10 minutes.

listCustomEquipment.name: Gumi's Fruit Flavored Frogs (Orange Persimmon)
listCustomEquipment.traits: 3rd Party, Rare, Alchemical, Consumable, Elixir, Mutagen, Polymorph
listCustomEquipment.description:
These fruit flavored gummy frog candies were developed by renowned tripkee alchemic chef Gumi Gaeru. Each frog provides a number of effects based on its color and flavor. When you consume one of these mutagenic candies, your eyes enlarge and protrude like a frog's, and your body is transformed as described.

Benefit Your skin becomes neon orange and you shrink to become Tiny in size. Your equipment shrinks with you but returns to its original size if removed. Your reach changes to 0 feet. If you were already Tiny, you gain a +5-foot status bonus to your speed.

Drawback You become Fascinated with any insectoid or arachnid creature that you can see (as determined by the GM). This Fascination only ends if the creature takes a hostile action against you (hostile actions against your allies do not end the Fascination effect) or one round has passed with you unable to see it. You have a -2 penalty to Will saves (-4 if you are Fascinated) and a -1 penalty to Fortitude saves.

The duration is 1 minute.

listCustomEquipment.name: Gumi's Fruit Flavored Frogs (Purple Plum)
listCustomEquipment.traits: 3rd Party, Rare, Alchemical, Consumable, Elixir, Mutagen, Polymorph
listCustomEquipment.description:
These fruit flavored gummy frog candies were developed by renowned tripkee alchemic chef Gumi Gaeru. Each frog provides a number of effects based on its color and flavor. When you consume one of these mutagenic candies, your eyes enlarge and protrude like a frog's, and your body is transformed as described.

Benefit Your body puffs up and thickens with your skin gaining a pale purple hue. You gain Resistance 10 to fire damage and cold damage. You gain a burrow speed of 15 feet and tremorsense with a range of 30 feet.

Drawback You become Fascinated with any insectoid or arachnid creature that you can see (as determined by the GM). This Fascination only ends if the creature takes a hostile action against you (hostile actions against your allies do not end the Fascination effect) or one round has passed with you unable to see it. You have a -2 penalty to Will saves (-4 if you are Fascinated) and a -1 penalty to Fortitude saves. In addition, you become Clumsy 1 for the duration.

The duration is 1 hour.

listCustomEquipment.name: Gumi's Fruit Flavored Frogs (Red Apple)
listCustomEquipment.traits: 3rd Party, Rare, Alchemical, Consumable, Elixir, Mutagen, Polymorph
listCustomEquipment.description:
These fruit flavored gummy frog candies were developed by renowned tripkee alchemic chef Gumi Gaeru. Each frog provides a number of effects based on its color and flavor. When you consume one of these mutagenic candies, your eyes enlarge and protrude like a frog's, and your body is transformed as described.

Benefit Your skin becomes a bright and deep red, your legs lengthen and their muscles increase in bulk. For the duration, you gain the benefits of the Powerful Leap feat.

Drawback You become Fascinated with any insectoid or arachnid creature that you can see (as determined by the GM). This Fascination only ends if the creature takes a hostile action against you (hostile actions against your allies do not end the Fascination effect) or one round has passed with you unable to see it. You have a -2 penalty to Will saves (-4 if you are Fascinated) and a -1 penalty to Fortitude saves.

The duration is 10 minutes.

listCustomEquipment.name: Gumi's Fruit Flavored Frogs (Yellow Lemon)
listCustomEquipment.traits: 3rd Party, Rare, Alchemical, Consumable, Elixir, Mutagen, Polymorph
listCustomEquipment.description:
These fruit flavored gummy frog candies were developed by renowned tripkee alchemic chef Gumi Gaeru. Each frog provides a number of effects based on its color and flavor. When you consume one of these mutagenic candies, your eyes enlarge and protrude like a frog's, and your body is transformed as described.

Benefit Your skin turns bright yellow, your eyes further enlarge and shift to the sides of your head. You gain a +2 item bonus to Nature checks, or a +4 if the check is to Recall Knowledge. You gain a +2 item bonus to perception checks made in Wilderness.

Drawback You become Fascinated with any insectoid or arachnid creature that you can see (as determined by the GM). This Fascination only ends if the creature takes a hostile action against you (hostile actions against your allies do not end the Fascination effect) or one round has passed with you unable to see it. You have a -2 penalty to Will saves (-4 if you are Fascinated) and a -1 penalty to Fortitude saves. In addition, you have a -2 item penalty to perception checks made in settlements.

The duration is 10 minutes.

listCustomEquipment.name: Hyphae Ham (Lesser)
listCustomEquipment.traits: 3rd Party, Rare, Alchemical, Consumable, Elixir, Mutagen, Polymorph
listCustomEquipment.description:
The result of alchemical experimentation on cordyceps infected pork, eating Hyphae Ham causes club shaped fungal growths to appear all over your body and your skin to become hard and leathery. Sufficient damage causes the growths to rupture, releasing poisonous spores, though the growths also inhibit your movement.

Benefit You gain Resistance 5 to bludgeoning damage, and the listed number of growths. Whenever a melee or ranged strike or spell attack succeeds against you, a growth ruptures releasing spores in a 5 foot emanation. Each creature other than yourself in the area takes the listed damage with a basic Fortitude save against the listed DC. A creature that Critically Fails also becomes Sickened 1. A creature that has already rolled a save against this effect treats all subsequent rolls against it as one degree of success higher. When you have no growths remaining, the effects of Hyphae Ham immediately end.

Drawback Your Speeds are reduced by 10 feet (to a minimum of 5 feet) and you take a –2 penalty to Reflex saves.

The DC is 19, a ruptured growth deals 3d6 poison damage, the number of growths is 1, and the duration is 1 minute.

listCustomEquipment.name: Hyphae Ham (Major)
listCustomEquipment.traits: 3rd Party, Rare, Alchemical, Consumable, Elixir, Mutagen, Polymorph
listCustomEquipment.description:
The result of alchemical experimentation on cordyceps infected pork, eating Hyphae Ham causes club shaped fungal growths to appear all over your body and your skin to become hard and leathery. Sufficient damage causes the growths to rupture, releasing poisonous spores, though the growths also inhibit your movement.

Whenever a melee or ranged strike or spell attack succeeds against you, a growth ruptures releasing spores in a 5 foot emanation. Each creature other than yourself in the area takes the listed damage with a basic Fortitude save against the listed DC. A creature that Critically Fails also becomes Sickened 1. A creature that has already rolled a save against this effect treats all subsequent rolls against it as one degree of success higher. When you have no growths remaining, the effects of Hyphae Ham immediately end.

Drawback Your Speeds are reduced by 10 feet (to a minimum of 5 feet) and you take a –2 penalty to Reflex saves.

The DC is 38, a ruptured growth deals 10d10 poison damage, the number of growths is 6, and the duration is 1 hour.

listCustomEquipment.traits: 3rd Party, Rare, Alchemical, Consumable, Elixir, Mutagen, Polymorph
listCustomEquipment.description:

A creature that has already rolled a save against this effect treats all subsequent rolls against it as one degree of success higher. When you have no growths remaining, the effects of Hyphae Ham immediately end.

Drawback Your Speeds are reduced by 10 feet (to a minimum of 5 feet) and you take a –2 penalty to Reflex saves.

The DC is 30, a ruptured growth deals 8d8 poison damage, the number of growths is 3, and the duration is 10 minutes.

listCustomEquipment.name: Mucous Mussels (Greater)
listCustomEquipment.traits: 3rd Party, Alchemical, Consumable, Elixir, Mutagen, Polymorph
listCustomEquipment.description:
Certain species of oysters have been observed to consume naturally occurring alchemical reagents, and eating them provides their benefits to you as well. After consumption, your skin becomes rubbery and slimy, producing a thick mucus which provides you with protection.

Benefit You gain resistance to Fire Damage. You gain an item bonus to Athletics checks to Disarm or Grapple. You can use the mucus to attach a number of items of light bulk to your body as a single action per item with the manipulate trait. You can interact as a free action once per turn to retrieve one of these items.

Drawback You gain Weakness 5 to Acid and Poison damage and the DC to end persistent Acid or Poison damage affecting you increases by 2. Athletics checks to Grab made against you gain a circumstance bonus equal to the item bonus.

The item bonus is +3, you have Resistance 10 to fire damage, the number of items which can be attached is 3, and the duration is 1 hour.

listCustomEquipment.name: Mucous Mussels (Lesser)
listCustomEquipment.traits: 3rd Party, Alchemical, Consumable, Elixir, Mutagen, Polymorph
listCustomEquipment.description:
Certain species of oysters have been observed to consume naturally occurring alchemical reagents, and eating them provides their benefits to you as well. After consumption, your skin becomes rubbery and slimy, producing a thick mucus which provides you with protection.

Benefit You gain resistance to Fire Damage. You gain an item bonus to Athletics checks to Disarm or Grapple. You can use the mucus to attach a number of items of light bulk to your body as a single action per item with the manipulate trait. You can interact as a free action once per turn to retrieve one of these items.

Drawback You gain Weakness 5 to Acid and Poison damage and the DC to end persistent Acid or Poison damage affecting you increases by 2. Athletics checks to Grab made against you gain a circumstance bonus equal to the item bonus.

The item bonus is +1, you have Resistance 2 to fire damage, the number of items which can be attached is 1, and the duration is 1 minute.

listCustomEquipment.name: Mucous Mussels (Major)
listCustomEquipment.traits: 3rd Party, Alchemical, Consumable, Elixir, Mutagen, Polymorph
listCustomEquipment.description:
Certain species of oysters have been observed to consume naturally occurring alchemical reagents, and eating them provides their benefits to you as well. After consumption, your skin becomes rubbery and slimy, producing a thick mucus which provides you with protection.

Benefit You gain resistance to Fire Damage. You gain an item bonus to Athletics checks to Disarm or Grapple. You can use the mucus to attach a number of items of light bulk to your body as a single action per item with the manipulate trait. You can interact as a free action once per turn to retrieve one of these items.

Drawback You gain Weakness 5 to Acid and Poison damage and the DC to end persistent Acid or Poison damage affecting you increases by 2. Athletics checks to Grab made against you gain a circumstance bonus equal to the item bonus.

The item bonus is +4, you have Resistance 20 to fire damage, the number of items which can be attached is 4, and the duration is 1 hour.

listCustomEquipment.name: Mucous Mussels (Moderate)
listCustomEquipment.traits: 3rd Party, Alchemical, Consumable, Elixir, Mutagen, Polymorph
listCustomEquipment.description:
Certain species of oysters have been observed to consume naturally occurring alchemical reagents, and eating them provides their benefits to you as well. After consumption, your skin becomes rubbery and slimy, producing a thick mucus which provides you with protection.

Benefit You gain resistance to Fire Damage. You gain an item bonus to Athletics checks to Disarm or Grapple. You can use the mucus to attach a number of items of light bulk to your body as a single action per item with the manipulate trait. You can interact as a free action once per turn to retrieve one of these items.

Drawback You gain Weakness 5 to Acid and Poison damage and the DC to end persistent Acid or Poison damage affecting you increases by 2. Athletics checks to Grab made against you gain a circumstance bonus equal to the item bonus.

The item bonus is +2, you have Resistance 5 to fire damage, the number of items which can be attached is 2, and the duration is 10 minutes.

listCustomEquipment.name: Oni-Giri (Greater)
listCustomEquipment.traits: 3rd Party, Uncommon, Alchemical, Consumable, Elixir, Mutagen, Polymorph
listCustomEquipment.description:
Developed by a traveling merchant to frighten off would-be assailants while also having lunch, Oni-giri causes your features shift and warp, making you to look sinister and menacing. Your muscles bulge, your skin takes on a red or blue hue, and you grow small horns protruding from your forehead.

Benefit You gain an item bonus to athletics and intimidation checks, and whenever you score a hit with a melee weapon, add the listed amount of damage of the same type as the weapon as a status bonus. If you are not speaking to Demoralize, or the target does not understand your language, you do not take the -4 circumstance penalty to the check.

Drawback You take a –1 penalty to AC and Will saves.

The item bonus is +3, add 1d6 damage on a hit with a melee weapon, and the duration is 1 hour.

listCustomEquipment.name: Oni-Giri (Lesser)
listCustomEquipment.traits: 3rd Party, Uncommon, Alchemical, Consumable, Elixir, Mutagen, Polymorph
listCustomEquipment.description:
Developed by a traveling merchant to frighten off would-be assailants while also having lunch, Oni-giri causes your features shift and warp, making you to look sinister and menacing. Your muscles bulge, your skin takes on a red or blue hue, and you grow small horns protruding from your forehead.

Benefit You gain an item bonus to athletics and intimidation checks, and whenever you score a hit with a melee weapon, add the listed amount of damage of the same type as the weapon as a status bonus. If you are not speaking to Demoralize, or the target does not understand your language, you do not take the -4 circumstance penalty to the check.

Drawback You take a –1 penalty to AC and Will saves.

The item bonus is +1, add 1 damage on a hit with a melee weapon, and the duration is 1 minute.

listCustomEquipment.name: Oni-Giri (Major)
listCustomEquipment.traits: 3rd Party, Uncommon, Alchemical, Consumable, Elixir, Mutagen, Polymorph
listCustomEquipment.description:
Developed by a traveling merchant to frighten off would-be assailants while also having lunch, Oni-giri causes your features shift and warp, making you to look sinister and menacing. Your muscles bulge, your skin takes on a red or blue hue, and you grow small horns protruding from your forehead.

Benefit You gain an item bonus to athletics and intimidation checks, and whenever you score a hit with a melee weapon, add the listed amount of damage of the same type as the weapon as a status bonus. If you are not speaking to Demoralize, or the target does not understand your language, you do not take the -4 circumstance penalty to the check.

Drawback You take a –1 penalty to AC and Will saves.

The item bonus is +4, add 2d6 damage on a hit with a melee weapon, and the duration is 1 minute. Whenever you Fail but do not Critically Fail an Intimidation check to Demoralize, you get a success instead.

listCustomEquipment.name: Oni-Giri (Moderate)
listCustomEquipment.traits: 3rd Party, Uncommon, Alchemical, Consumable, Elixir, Mutagen, Polymorph
listCustomEquipment.description:
Developed by a traveling merchant to frighten off would-be assailants while also having lunch, Oni-giri causes your features shift and warp, making you to look sinister and menacing. Your muscles bulge, your skin takes on a red or blue hue, and you grow small horns protruding from your forehead.

Benefit You gain an item bonus to athletics and intimidation checks, and whenever you score a hit with a melee weapon, add the listed amount of damage of the same type as the weapon as a status bonus. If you are not speaking to Demoralize, or the target does not understand your language, you do not take the -4 circumstance penalty to the check.

Drawback You take a –1 penalty to AC and Will saves.

The item bonus is +2, add 1d4 damage on a hit with a melee weapon, and the duration is 10 minutes.

listCustomEquipment.name: Pickled Aberration Eyes
listCustomEquipment.traits: 3rd Party, Rare, Alchemical, Consumable, Elixir, Mutagen, Polymorph
listCustomEquipment.description:
Plucked an aberration and turned into a macabre snack, these eyes still seem to watch you. After consumption, eyes sprout all over your body allowing you to see in all directions at once. While this extra information is beneficial in some ways, it can be disorienting.

Benefit You gain a +2 item bonus to visual Perception checks and visual Perception Initiative rolls. You gain All-Around Vision and cannot become Off Guard from flanking. The duration is 1 minute.

Drawback You take a -2 penalty to Fortitude and Reflex saves (-4 against Visual effects), and gain Weakness 5 to Piercing Damage.

listCustomEquipment.name: Punimallows (Greater)
listCustomEquipment.traits: 3rd Party, Rare, Alchemical, Consumable, Elixir, Mutagen, Polymorph
listCustomEquipment.description:
Originally created by a child prodigy in an effort to protect her father who was going to war, consumption of these alchemical marshmallows cause your skin to puff, becoming soft to the touch and sticky beneath the surface. You are much harder to harm, but deal less damage as a result.

Benefit You gain Resistance to piercing, slashing, and bludgeoning damage.

Drawback You gain Weakness to fire damage equal to the granted resistance and the DC to end persistent fire damage increases by 1. You are Off-Guard against Jaws unarmed melee strikes made against you, and if hit by a Jaws strike the resistance to piercing granted by Punimallows is negated. You take a –2 penalty to attack rolls and save DCs of offensive spells, and a –2 penalty per damage die to all weapon, unarmed attack, and spell damage.

You gain Resistance 12 to piercing, slashing, and bludgeoning damage and the duration is 10 minutes, and the duration is 1 hour.

listCustomEquipment.name: Punimallows (Major)
listCustomEquipment.traits: 3rd Party, Rare, Alchemical, Consumable, Elixir, Mutagen, Polymorph
listCustomEquipment.description:
Originally created by a child prodigy in an effort to protect her father who was going to war, consumption of these alchemical marshmallows cause your skin to puff, becoming soft to the touch and sticky beneath the surface. You are much harder to harm, but deal less damage as a result.

Benefit You gain Resistance to piercing, slashing, and bludgeoning damage.

Drawback You gain Weakness to fire damage equal to the granted resistance and the DC to end persistent fire damage increases by 1. You are Off-Guard against Jaws unarmed melee strikes made against you, and if hit by a Jaws strike the resistance to piercing granted by Punimallows is negated. You take a –2 penalty to attack rolls and save DCs of offensive spells, and a –2 penalty per damage die to all weapon, unarmed attack, and spell damage.

You gain Resistance 20 to piercing, slashing, and bludgeoning damage, you gain Immunity to Critical Hits, and the duration is 1 hour.

listCustomEquipment.name: Punimallows (Moderate)
listCustomEquipment.traits: 3rd Party, Rare, Alchemical, Consumable, Elixir, Mutagen, Polymorph
listCustomEquipment.description:

You are Off-Guard against Jaws unarmed melee strikes made against you, and if hit by a Jaws strike the resistance to piercing granted by Punimallows is negated. You take a –2 penalty to attack rolls and save DCs of offensive spells, and a –2 penalty per damage die to all weapon, unarmed attack, and spell damage.

You gain Resistance 6 to piercing, slashing, and bludgeoning damage and the duration is 10 minutes.
